name: Lightless Home
description:
The light is gone !

You are the mayor from a small village where all the light has disappeared ! Light up all the hearthes of your villagers houses before the night take them, because strange sounds can be heard when it's too dark, there's something in here

Controls
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Hold shift to run
  • Press E to light up a hearth or to place your torch
  • Press E to open a door and spacebar to unlock it

This game has been developped for the Global Game Jam 2019
